title: Bulwarx Internal Portal UI Design
description: Designed an internal portal for Bulwarx to enhance employee communication and engagement through an intuitive, accessible, and visually cohesive interface.
overview: Designed and developed a comprehensive internal portal that serves as a central hub for employees and partners, focusing on security workflows and real-time threat monitoring based on cybersecurity best practices.
process: Collaborated with security professionals to understand complex workflows and translate them into intuitive user interfaces. The process involved extensive user research, wireframing, prototyping, and iterative testing.
impact: Improved workflow efficiency by 40% and enhanced user satisfaction within cybersecurity operations. The portal now serves as the central tool for enhancing engagement and internal communications.

title: DroneChef Restaurant Management
description: Event-driven restaurant management system with real-time monitoring capabilities and advanced analytics for kitchen operations.
overview: Created a unified platform to manage orders, inventory, staff scheduling, and real-time kitchen operations, addressing fragmented systems and inefficiencies during peak hours.
process: Developed an event-driven architecture with real-time updates, intuitive dashboard design, and comprehensive analytics. Focused on minimizing cognitive load for kitchen staff while providing comprehensive management tools.
impact: Achieved 40% faster order processing, reduced food waste by 30%, and improved overall kitchen efficiency. Multi-location support enabled franchise growth.

title: Ginegar E-commerce Platform
description: E-commerce platform for a global agricultural products company specializing in greenhouse solutions and agricultural products.
overview: Designed a digital-first platform for a leading agricultural company, handling complex product catalogs, international shipping, and multi-language support across 15 countries.
process: Created a clean, nature-inspired interface with intuitive product categorization, advanced filtering options, and seamless checkout experience. Implemented multi-currency support and localized content management.
impact: Launched successfully across 15 countries, resulting in 60% increase in online sales and significantly expanded market reach with improved customer satisfaction.

title: IEC Internal Product Transfer Platform
description: Designed an internal platform for the Israel Electric Corporation to streamline product transfers, delivering an intuitive, responsive, and consistent UI across devices.
overview: Developed an intra-organizational platform to optimize operational management across the national electrical grid, serving various user types from field technicians to grid operators and project managers.
process: Conducted extensive user research and fulfilled the company's established design system to ensure consistency. Focused on creating an intuitive interface that would elevate routine organizational tasks into something more pleasant and efficient.
impact: Successfully streamlined internal operations across multiple power stations nationwide, improving equipment tracking efficiency and reducing training time for new users. Now serves as the central hub for managing electrical infrastructure assets.

title: Cyberint Risk Monitoring Platform
description: Proactive external risk monitoring and mitigation platform with real-time threat detection, risk assessment, and security incident management.
overview: Developed a platform combining real-time threat intelligence and deep web monitoring to proactively identify and mitigate external risks. Created an intuitive system handling complex security workflows while remaining accessible to various user types.
process: Conducted extensive user research with security analysts, collaborated with development teams for technical feasibility, and created a comprehensive design system from scratch. Process involved wireframing, prototyping, and iterative testing with customer feedback.
impact: Transformed how clients monitor and respond to external threats. Reduced incident response times, improved collaboration between security teams, and enhanced overall security posture. The design system continues to guide product development.
